phrases.phrase: 나한테 들키지 않을 것이라고 생각하고 있었어?
meanings: 감정 Did you think I wouldn't find out?

vlive.korean: [사연 읽어주는 태태] 몰폰 중인데 들키지 않는 방법을 이렇게... [V is reading a message] A way to hide the fact that you're using a cellphone... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] ABC.. D제이가 D지버지게 깜찍한 보이는 라디오 해요!!(~˘▾˘)~🎤🎶 (V’s first visual radio)
vlive.english: [V is reading a message] A way to hide the fact that you're using a cellphone...

vlive.korean: 저 어저께 - 그런데 지금 얘기하니까 들키지 않았어? Well, You caught me? 듣기 View video NCT : 드림을 사랑하는bang법💚💚
자기가 악플러라는 거 들키지 않으려고 도망갔다? He ran away in order to be not caught being the one who wrote hateful comments? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 2화 <어린왕자 댓글사건 Ⅱ>
vlive.english: He ran away in order to be not caught being the one who wrote hateful comments?

vlive.korean: 명훈이는 메시지를 들키지 않기 위해 숫자와 책으로 나눠진 암호를 남겼어. In order to not get caught, he put the numbers as passwords on the books. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 14화 <스나이퍼 예매사건 Ⅱ>
vlive.english: In order to not get caught, he put the numbers as passwords on the books.

vlive.korean: 우리 어딨는지 들키지 않게 해야 돼. We should hide where we are. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 리막 뭐하게 ?!
vlive.english: We should hide where we are.

examples.korean: How could anyone break into the palace undetected? 발음듣기 어떻게 누군가가 아무에게도 들키지 않고 그 궁전에 침입할 수가 있죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How could anyone break into the palace undetected? 발음

examples.korean: We managed to escape observation. 발음듣기 우리는 용케 들키지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We managed to escape observation. 발음

examples.korean: The difference between a moral man and a man of honor is that the latter regrets a discreditable act, even when it has worked and he has not been caught. (H. L. Mencken) 발음듣기 도덕적 인간과 명예로운 인간의 차이는 이렇다. 설령 수치스런 행동을 들키지 않아도 이를 후회하는 쪽은 후자다. (헨리 루이스 멩켄, 명예명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: The difference between a moral man and a man of honor is that the latter regrets a discreditable act, even when it has worked and he has not been caught. (H. L. Mencken) 발음

examples.korean: She slipped out of the room for fear that she should(= lest she should) be seen by her father. 발음듣기 아버지에게 들키지 않으려고 그녀는 방에서 살짝 나왔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She slipped out of the room for fear that she should(= lest she should) be seen by her father. 발음

examples.korean: He slipped away without being noticed. 발음듣기 그는 들키지 않고 가로샜다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He slipped away without being noticed. 발음
